Description: L.L. Bean, Inc., of Freeport, Maine, agreed to pay a civil penalty of $750,000 to settle allegations that it violated the Consumer Product Safety Act when it delayed in reporting to CPSC that two of its backpack child carriers were defective.

Info Source: Extracted from a download of OSHA's Enforcment Data downloaded on 3/02/2022, available at https://enforcedata.dol.gov/views/data_catalogs.php
